testcase.classname: F01_Register | users could register with new accounts
testcase.name: guest user could register with valid data successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user go to register page..............................................passed When user select gender type................................................passed And user enter first name "automation" and last name "tester"...............passed And user enter date of birth................................................passed And user enter email "samah@yahoo.com" field................................passed And user fills Password fields "Passw0rd#123" "Passw0rd#123"................passed Then user clicks on register button.........................................passed And success message is displayed............................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with valid credentials "samah@yahoo.com" and "Passw0rd#123".passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed

testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user can't login with invalid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given user go to login page.................................................passed When user login with invalid "wrong@example.com" and "P@ssw0rd".............passed And user press on login button..............................................passed Then user could not login to the system.....................................passed
